name: part_005
file: tmp_【#myth4EVER】hololive English -Myth- 4th Anniversary Concert： The Show Goes On! [CDljbqawDkw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope and Takanashi Kiara perform a duet version of 'REFLECT'.
MC section where Calliope and Kiara discuss the performance and their song choices.

subtitles.original:
Look at this so-called "gem of the sea,"
I'll unscramble you, know what I mean?
subtitles.english:
Look at this so-called "gem of the sea,"
I'll unscramble you, know what I mean?

subtitles.original:
But who're you watching now?
It ain't much of a now, it shows.
subtitles.english:
But who're you watching now?
It ain't much of a now, it shows.

subtitles.original:
私はあんな奴とは違うの
やめてよ 決めつけはもう
subtitles.english:
I'm not like that person.
Stop it, I'm done with the assumptions.

subtitles.original: 大嫌い (大嫌い)
subtitles.english: I hate it (I hate it).

subtitles.original:
理想の姿じゃなくていい
私らしくあれば
subtitles.english:
It's fine if I'm not the ideal figure.
As long as I'm true to myself,

subtitles.original: ただ分かってほしいだけよ
subtitles.english: I just want you to understand.

subtitles.original: 理想通りじゃなきゃ意味なんてない
subtitles.english: If it's not as ideal, there's no meaning.

subtitles.original:
希望も夢すら無くたって
辛い 辛い 辛い 辛い
subtitles.english:
Even without hope or dreams,
it's painful, painful, painful, painful.

subtitles.original: あなた居場所はあるのかしら？
subtitles.english: Do you even have a place where you belong?

subtitles.original: 諦めて楽になるわ さぁ
subtitles.english: Give up and you'll be at ease, come on.

subtitles.original: ずっと追い求めた
subtitles.english: Chasing it all this time,

subtitles.original: 私なりの答え
subtitles.english: The answer in my own way.

subtitles.original: 自分にだけは嘘はつきたくないの
subtitles.english: I don't want to lie to myself at the very least.

subtitles.original: ごめんね
subtitles.english: I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: One story ends 今まで
subtitles.english: One story ends, until now.

subtitles.original:
Begin again (Begin)
気づかなかったことがあるんだけど
subtitles.english:
Begin again (Begin),
though there are things I didn't notice.

subtitles.original: While hand in hand どうして
subtitles.english: While hand in hand, why?

subtitles.original:
Until the end (Until the end)
いてくれたから今の私がいる
subtitles.english:
Until the end (Until the end),
I am who I am because you were there.

subtitles.original: 過去はいらない？ そんなことはない
subtitles.english: Don't need the past? That's not true.

subtitles.original: 未来は見えない方がマシじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it better not to see the future?

subtitles.original:
ここから No matter where
静かに Watch over me
subtitles.english:
From here, no matter where,
quietly watch over me.

subtitles.original: 私を見守っていてね
subtitles.english: Please keep watching over me.

subtitles.original: So, you think that's all, huh?
subtitles.english: So, you think that's all, huh?

subtitles.original: Just gotta leave like it's nothing?
subtitles.english: Just gotta leave like it's nothing?

subtitles.original:
Going without me?
I don't know what you're thinking!
subtitles.english:
Going without me?
I don't know what you're thinking!

subtitles.original:
Return to the sea,
a shark is all you'll ever be. さよなら。
subtitles.english:
Return to the sea,
a shark is all you'll ever be. Farewell.

subtitles.original: One story ends ありがとう Begin again
subtitles.english: One story ends, thank you. Begin again.

subtitles.original: 隠していた私はもういらない さよなら
subtitles.english: I don't need the hidden me anymore. Farewell.

subtitles.original: Once hand in hand ありがとう Until the end
subtitles.english: Once hand in hand, thank you. Until the end.

subtitles.original: すべてを受け入れて生きていくから
subtitles.english: Because I'll live accepting everything.

subtitles.original: 海の底はつまらないけど
subtitles.english: The bottom of the sea is boring, but

subtitles.original: あなたの言葉 忘れないから
subtitles.english: I won't forget your words.

subtitles.original:
いつでも No matter where
どこでも Watch over me
subtitles.english:
Anytime, no matter where,
anywhere, watch over me.

subtitles.original: 私らしく生きていこう
subtitles.english: I'll live as myself.

subtitles.original: 不退転の覚悟、曲がるかな？
subtitles.english: Does the determination of no retreat bend?

subtitles.original:
Time to die, bird!
No!
subtitles.english:
Time to die, bird!
No!

subtitles.original:
It's your time to go!
No!
subtitles.english:
It's your time to go!
No!

subtitles.original: I'm gonna get you finally!
subtitles.english: I'm gonna get you finally!

subtitles.original:
Get over here! Get over here!
You stupid bird!
subtitles.english:
Get over here! Get over here!
You stupid bird!

subtitles.original:
Sorry! I thought whatever I did!
Dogeza, dogeza, dogeza!
subtitles.english:
Sorry! I thought whatever I did!
Dogeza, dogeza, dogeza!

subtitles.original: That's what I thought. Kneel!
subtitles.english: That's what I thought. Kneel!

subtitles.original: What did I do?
subtitles.english: What did I do?

subtitles.original: You guys forget that I'm a killer.
subtitles.english: You guys forget that I'm a killer.

subtitles.original: Actually, sometimes I forget that I'm a killer.
subtitles.english: Actually, sometimes I forget that I'm a killer.

subtitles.original:
Whoops. That was fun though!
How did you guys like Reflect?
subtitles.english:
Whoops. That was fun though!
How did you guys like Reflect?

subtitles.original:
That was dramatic, right?
Dramatic!
subtitles.english:
That was dramatic, right?
Dramatic!

subtitles.original:
Yes! I got to make up for my
lack of dancing skills...
subtitles.english:
Yes! I got to make up for my
lack of dancing skills...

subtitles.original: ...with drama.
subtitles.english: ...with drama.

subtitles.original: What do you lack?
subtitles.english: What do you lack?

subtitles.original: You did so well!
subtitles.english: You did so well!

subtitles.original: I-I don't know! It was really tough.
subtitles.english: I-I don't know! It was really tough.

subtitles.original: And with the scythe, right?
subtitles.english: And with the scythe, right?

subtitles.original:
It is very heavy.
It looks like it's not very heavy,
subtitles.english:
It is very heavy.
It looks like it's not very heavy,

subtitles.original:
but it actually weighs a ton.
I'm just really strong, you see.
subtitles.english:
but it actually weighs a ton.
I'm just really strong, you see.

subtitles.original:
But the way you're dancing around with it
is kind of dangerous.
subtitles.english:
But the way you're dancing around with it
is kind of dangerous.

subtitles.original: Yeah, sorry about that if I accidentally hit you.
subtitles.english: Yeah, sorry about that if I accidentally hit you.

subtitles.original:
It would be curtains for you,
but maybe that's what I secretly want.
subtitles.english:
It would be curtains for you,
but maybe that's what I secretly want.

subtitles.original: Hmm? So we did Reflect together!
subtitles.english: Hmm? So we did Reflect together!

subtitles.original: We did! As our duo song.
subtitles.english: We did! As our duo song.

subtitles.original: And what did you do?
subtitles.english: And what did you do?

subtitles.original:
I did "Full Color" by... Gura!
I love that song so much.
subtitles.english:
I did "Full Color" by... Gura!
I love that song so much.

subtitles.original: Still unreleased! Oh, so unreleased.
subtitles.english: Still unreleased! Oh, so unreleased.

subtitles.original: Where is it, Goombus?
subtitles.english: Where is it, Goombus?

subtitles.original:
But I will say that that was probably the
hardest choreography,
subtitles.english:
But I will say that that was probably the
hardest choreography,

subtitles.original:
the solo choreography that I've learned,
aside from maybe Go Getter.
subtitles.english:
the solo choreography that I've learned,
aside from maybe Go Getter.

subtitles.original: Maybe that... that was the hardest.
subtitles.english: Maybe that... that was the hardest.

subtitles.original: That's good, you have to challenge yourself!
subtitles.english: That's good, you have to challenge yourself!

subtitles.original: I was happy to challenge myself to learn that.
subtitles.english: I was happy to challenge myself to learn that.

subtitles.original: And I still know the movements.
subtitles.english: And I still know the movements.

subtitles.original: You know, the hip sway is so fun!
subtitles.english: You know, the hip sway is so fun!

subtitles.original: Yeah, I can imagine.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I can imagine.

subtitles.original: What about you? What did you sing?
subtitles.english: What about you? What did you sing?

subtitles.original: I did "Ame-Ame-Chiku-Taku"!
subtitles.english: I did "Ame-Ame-Chiku-Taku"!

subtitles.original:
Well, you know, actually originally when they were like,
"Okay, so we're gonna do the switcheroo,"
subtitles.english:
Well, you know, actually originally when they were like,
"Okay, so we're gonna do the switcheroo,"

subtitles.original: "you sing whatever whose song you want to sing,"
subtitles.english: "you sing whatever whose song you want to sing,"

subtitles.original:
And I said, "Ame, Ame, please let me do Chiku-Taku!
I want to sing Chiku-Taku!"
subtitles.english:
And I said, "Ame, Ame, please let me do Chiku-Taku!
I want to sing Chiku-Taku!"

subtitles.original: I was like the first, I think, to shout out, so...
subtitles.english: I was like the first, I think, to shout out, so...

subtitles.original: I know how much you love that song.
subtitles.english: I know how much you love that song.

subtitles.original: And I loved your bouncy movements to it.
subtitles.english: And I loved your bouncy movements to it.

subtitles.original: And "Aree!" I like that you changed the lyrics too.
subtitles.english: And "Aree!" I like that you changed the lyrics too.

subtitles.original: "I'm not just a phoenix, I'm a Tencho"?
subtitles.english: "I'm not just a phoenix, I'm a Tencho"?

subtitles.original: Yeah, something like that. Something like that.
subtitles.english: Yeah, something like that. Something like that.

subtitles.original: It was cute.
subtitles.english: It was cute.

subtitles.original: そうですね。
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original:
And we finished it off with our Reflect, which I think is
made for... you know, to be a duet after all.
subtitles.english:
And we finished it off with our Reflect, which I think is
made for... you know, to be a duet after all.

subtitles.original:
It's a duet after all.
And we make a really good duet.
subtitles.english:
It's a duet after all.
And we make a really good duet.

subtitles.original:
So there seems to be a theme, right?
There is a theme here.
subtitles.english:
So there seems to be a theme, right?
There is a theme here.

subtitles.original: Of doing each other's songs.
subtitles.english: Of doing each other's songs.

subtitles.original: It seems so. Interesting.
subtitles.english: It seems so. Interesting.

subtitles.original: Well, I wonder what will be next!
subtitles.english: Well, I wonder what will be next!
